response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer aligns well with your budget and expectations. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
